messages.title: Labour is the smart vote in West Oxfordshire
messages.content: Compare the difference between Labour and Liberal Democrats on key issues in this constituency.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour is capable of forming a government without a coalition.
Labour commits to end crippling austerity.
Labour supports a people's vote, not revoke, on Brexit.
Labour is actively tackling the climate emergency.
Labour vows to bring the NHS back to life.
Labour has a commitment to improve schools and reduce class size.

mentions.candidate: Rosa Bolger has a fantastic local track record.

issues.brexitEurope: Labour supports a people's vote, not revoke, on Brexit.
issues.economy: Labour commits to end crippling austerity.
issues.education: Labour has a commitment to improve schools and reduce class size.
issues.environment: Labour is actively tackling the climate emergency.
issues.governance: Labour is capable of forming a government without a coalition.
issues.health: Labour vows to bring the NHS back to life.

images.caption: Comparison chart showing Labour positions compared with Liberal Democrats on various issues in West Oxfordshire.
